item.title: Globbing
item.description: Today I was playing with hugo and I wanted to automate my pipeline a bit so I made a script that looked like this: eval 'rm -rv !("hugo"|*.sh)' But I quickly discovered that even if that would work on a shell it would not work on a script. That is because a script doesn’t know how to process globbing (round parentesys expansion). To fix that I enabled glob changing the script as follows:
